mapper.insert: insert into user(id, username, userid, nickname, password, phonenumber, zipcode, address1, address2, birthday, sex, email, regdate, role) values (#{id}, #{username}, #{userid}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{phonenumber}, #{zipcode }, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{birthday}, #{sex}, #{email}, now(), 'USER')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user WHERE userid = #{userid} AND password = #{password}
